entry.title: configure object Definition-Visibility Rule
entry.content:
Custom object : EXP ******* Form
Requirement: Restrict form access so that it is available and visible only to employees whose Pay Scale Level is 5 or higher. Employees below Level 5 should not be able to see or access the form in the system. Could plz anyone help with this in step by step process to fallow.

entry.title: SAP SuccessFactors Data Loader
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I read the below in an article and just need to know if we really have any tools like this in SF.

*****************************************************************************************************************

SAP SuccessFactors Data Loader

  • Use Case: While this isn’t a SAP solution outside of SuccessFactors, it’s an important tool for ensuring that data is in the right format when importing into Employee Central.
  • How it Helps:
    • Data Formatting: SAP SuccessFactors Data Loader requires the data to be in a specific format. Using tools like SAP Data Services or SAP MDG to format the data before uploading can ensure smooth integration.
    • Validation Checks: The Data Loader also performs basic validation checks on the data to ensure that it conforms to SuccessFactors standards before proceeding with the upload.

******************************************************************************************************************************

Appreciate your response on this.

Regards,

SR

entry.title: Delimit IT105 when Employee is Terminated via Replication program EC to S4
entry.content:
When employee is Terminated in EC, we use replication program to send update to S4/ERP.

However, the delimiting of IT105 particularly System Username is not delimit.

Is there standard to delimit? Or suggestion of how to go about it?

Thanks.

entry.title: SF EC to ERP replication error
entry.content: I have hired a new employee on employee central and when I am replicating an employee from SF EC to ERP, it gives error IndVal of wage type 0001: No entry in table T510 for key '9903RC1EI 000001' on 13.08.2025.I have checked T510 table, nothing has changed since previous replication.

entry.title: User-id for Concurrent employment
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I have questions regarding to user-id generation for concurrent employment via import.

Is it possible to auto populate or overwrite user-id by user-id created by Business Rule when importing Employment Details via Import Employee Data?

I know that field of "user-id" is mandatory when importing Employment Details. 

I created business rule to sequentially generate user-id for each Legal Entity. For example, if a concurrent employment is added for Legal Entity A, then the user-id will be generate from 11000000, and if it is added for Legal Entity B, then the user-id will be generate from 12000000.

I would like to know if it is possible to generate user-id based on the business rule when importing Employment Details. 

If it is impossible, I would like to know whether the user-id generated by the business rule can overwrite user-id imported by Employment Details.

SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central

entry.title: How to build custom extensions using BTP in SuccessFactors
entry.content:
Hello Everyone-

I am planning to build some custom apps./extensions or APIs using BTP in SuccessFactors . I have taken BTP trail a/c, and also SAP Build trial version,. There are some APIs in SAP Business Accelerator Hub but i am not understanding where to start and the step by step procerdure.

For example I mam trying to create a tile on SF Home page which will display total number of active employees in EC, How can this be done using BTP.

 

Please guide me.

entry.title: Define the selection method for the new business rule scenario following the deprecation of 'Base'
entry.content:
Hello everyone,
Starting from the first half of the 2024 release, it will no longer be possible to create new business rules using the "Basic" scenario.
SAP Help Portal | SAP Online Help

The ability to create new rules using the "Basic" rule scenario was deprecated on November 17, 2023, and was removed on June 2, 2024.

This change not only affects the creation of new business rules, but may also require updates to previously created rules in certain cases.

To prepare for such situations, we plan to create a reference list titled "Selecting Business Rule Scenarios Based on Requirements."
For example:
When entering a management allowance, if consistency is not maintained, an error message will be displayed. → In this case, use the "HRIS Element Validation" scenario.

We appreciate your insights and cooperation.
Let’s make this thread a reliable resource for mastering the selection of business rule scenarios.

entry.title: Geozone Implementation
entry.content:
Hello,

We are looking to talk with other companies in North America that are using geozones to provide differentials based on locations. We want to be able to use one job code, and then based on locations have the differential applied, without maintaining multiple ranges. Has anyone achieved this? If not this process, how have you achieved this?

Thanks,

Kelly

entry.title: How to change the view of ask hr?
entry.content: Hello community, I'd like to change the view in Ask HR, as it has a plain white view with no colors, just the ticket count and statuses. Could you please guide me on how to change the layout, add colors, or even a corporate logo? Thank you for your support.

entry.title: Adding employee to Employee Central without an e-mail
entry.content:
Scenario:

A Customer uses Paradox ATS and Onboarding – not using SAP Recruiting or Onboarding.

They then need that employee to be added to Core HR employee central and the other SFSF modules. Can they be added without an e-mail? i.e. can they sign in with a phone number as a username and access the system that way? Or with a dummy e-mail address, not validate it, but use it as a username, set a password, and access the system on a mobile device?

Is there a similar workaround for Recruiting and/or Onboarding?

Thank you.

entry.title: SuccessFactors : Adding IP address in reporting
entry.content:
Dear All, 

I don't know if this is the right place, but I came across a KBA telling me that it's not possible to get the IP address of an user in reporting. 

Improvement Request Details - Customer Influence

Fortunately there is already a customer influence request, but so far, only 1 vote (plus mine). And I'm surprised that not more person are interested in this kind of information. Especially for API user and maybe some other scenarios (as mentioned in the request). 

So on top of adding some visibility to this request, I'm wondering if I'm not missing something and if there is not another way to get to this information ? 

Thanks, 

Christopher

entry.title: EC to HCM replication of position: Where can I influence on the data?
entry.content: I am looking for a possibility to influence on the data that is being saved during a replication of position data (tables HRP...) from EC to HCM. While for  employee data there is a BADI, I didn't find any for the position data. I am working on a 750 ABAP stack. Can anyone help with this?

entry.title: SAP Onbaording Email Notifications
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

In SAP ONB once we initiate the Onboarding process through the 'Add New Hire to Onboarding' page is it possible to have an email notification sent to the responsible Hiring Manager that a new Onboardee was added to the system and that they need to perform 'Review New Hire Data' step?

Any KBAs that you can recommend or if you have configured this before in a system?

Thank you!

entry.title: Prevent workflows from being approved after a certain date
entry.content:
Hi,

We use workflow approvals to manage time-off.
We currently have a rule to prevent submission before a certain date (Using Rules attached to the time type).

Problem is, managers are approving workflows for days requested in the past, where payroll for that period already closed.

For example, say you want a week off from September 1st until September 7th.  That payroll period is currently open...
So they will be able to submit the time-off and create the workflow just fine.

The problem comes when a manager approves this but it's too late.... for example, If the manager approves this on September 2nd, this will be late for payroll, as on September 2nd, the pay period is already closed.

Is there any way to prevent a Workflow from being approved after a certain date?

entry.title: SAP SuccessFactors Reporting - Aggregated Columns Label Field Issue
entry.content:
Hi Folks,

I am writing this to raise a flag about an issue with the Reporting Tool in SAP SuccessFactors .  When field labels are used in Aggregated columns Filters, the Error getting Preview issue is raised and the Report doesn't produce any results. The Report works as expected when the same field with Name is used. For example, in my instance I want to filter a specific pay component, when pay component (label) field is used, The Error getting preview issue is thrown and the report does not produce any results. When Pay Component (Name) field is used in the filter, it works as expected.

Requesting the Reporting Team to work on this and provide with a fix to have consistent behavior with all the fields when used in the filters.

entry.title: Receiving CompetencyMigrationFailuresCheck when Language is Deactivated
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We have JDM 1.0 and Competency Library 2.1 with 9 languages. Among them are Spanish (Spain) and Spanish (Mexico) languages, but we disabled the Spanish (Spain) as we don't want to use it.

Recently we updated our JDM 1.0 to JPB and found that we are receiving an error when we run Check Tool on JPB post migration. The error shows as CompetencyMigrationFailuresCheck. And this shows all the Spanish (Spain) translation as errors.

But, when we enable Spanish (Spain) language in the system, and run the check tool, then were no errors popped up and the check tool says No issues found.

This behavior seems to be not as expected. Why the Check Tool shows above error when we disable Spanish (Spain) language but No issues when we enable Spanish (Spain) language.

Appreciate if any guidance on it. Please let us know if any one faced this type of issue  or how they fixed it.

Regards,
Balaji
